title: How and why did the colonization of North and South America differ? - Quora

response.answer_text: NA was mostly colonised by British, SA was mostly colonised by Spanish, French, and Portuguese.NA is more Protestant based, SA is more Catholic.NA is more individualistic, SA is more communal.Race mixing was more taboo historically in NA, while it wasn't as stigmatized and sometimes even encouraged in SA.Any other differences are mostly a result of these reasons above.
